mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY LIKE #{category} AND CS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.CS_NO, A.CATEGORY, A.CS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as CREATE_DATE, B.USER_NAME FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY LIKE #{category} AND A.CS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY A.CS_NO DESC

INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_SERVICE ( CS_NO, CS_TITLE, CS_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CATEGORY, USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CUSTOMER_SERVICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{customerTitle}, #{customerContent}, SYSDATE, #{category}, #{userNo} )

SELECT CS_NO, CS_TITLE, CS_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, STATUS, CATEGORY, USER_NO, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = CUSTOMER_SERVICE.USER_NO) AS USER_NAME FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE WHERE CS_NO = #{customerNo}
